title: just realized how bad i was
body: i def deserve bronze/silver.. when i watch pro players i always know what to do and it play outs in my head but watching a replay of myself i see how bad i am.. i do so much stupid shit unintentionally, like i generally always win lane if im playing zed/lb/ryze but then i do retarded shit that even b5 players don't do

replies.body:
I just played my first ranked, i was happy in gold, thought i deserved gold.
Suddenly i was like in a vice, the game was twice as fast, people dying left and right, dodging skill shots outplays etc...
WTF???

my team:
3 Gold
2 silver

vs.

3 plats!@!!!!!
2 gold

WTF riot? Get Hillary Clinton's for that bs.

ps: it was actually a really fun game despite losing.
MY MAN. YOU ARE A GOD
That's one step,towards getting better realising what you're doing wrong. The next step is to work on not doing it so often
Agreed. At low elo most people flame rather than focusing on improving themselves.
